statements: SELECT * FROM vaccination_coverage;
SELECT region_name, coverage_rate FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80;
SELECT region_name, total_population FROM vaccination_coverage ORDER BY total_population DESC;
SELECT region_name, coverage_rate FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT region_name, immunization_schedule FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE immunization_schedule IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80 ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT region_name, total_population FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE total_population > 1000000 ORDER BY total_population DESC;
SELECT region_name, coverage_rate FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE immunization_schedule = 'Routine Schedule' ORDER BY coverage_rate DESC;
SELECT region_name, coverage_rate, immunization_schedule FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE coverage_rate < 50 AND total_population < 500000 ORDER BY total_population ASC;
SELECT region_name AS Name, total_population AS Population, coverage_rate AS Rate FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE coverage_rate BETWEEN 60 AND 70 ORDER BY coverage_rate DESC, total_population ASC;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE region_id = 1;
SELECT region_name, coverage_rate FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80;
SELECT vaccine_name, dose_number FROM immunization_schedule WHERE region_id = 2 ORDER BY dose_number DESC;
SELECT * FROM immunization_schedule WHERE schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT region_name, coverage_rate FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE coverage_rate < 50 ORDER BY region_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE region_id = 1
SELECT region_name, coverage_rate FROM vaccination_coverage ORDER BY coverage_rate DESC
SELECT region_name, coverage_rate FROM vaccination_coverage WHERE coverage_rate > 80 AND region_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT vaccine_name, COUNT(schedule_id) AS schedule_count FROM immunization_schedule GROUP BY vaccine_name ORDER BY schedule_count DESC
SELECT region_id, COUNT(schedule_id) AS schedule_count FROM immunization_schedule GROUP BY region_id HAVING schedule_count > 5
SELECT * FROM vaccination_centers;
SELECT center_name, region_name FROM vaccination_centers ORDER BY center_id DESC;
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer FROM vaccines WHERE dose_required = 2;

SELECT center_name, vaccine_name, schedule_date FROM vaccination_centers INNER JOIN immunization_schedule ON vaccination_centers.center_id = immunization_schedule.center_id AND vaccination_centers.center_id = 1;

SELECT center_name, vaccine_name, schedule_date FROM vaccination_centers INNER JOIN immunization_schedule ON vaccination_centers.center_id = immunization_schedule.center_id ORDER BY schedule_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_centers WHERE region_name = 'East';
SELECT center_name, region_name FROM vaccination_centers ORDER BY center_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vaccines WHERE dose_required > 1 AND manufacturer = 'Pfizer' ORDER BY vaccine_name ASC;

SELECT vaccination_centers.center_name, vaccines.vaccine_name, immunization_schedule.schedule_date FROM immunization_schedule JOIN vaccination_centers ON immunization_schedule.center_id = vaccination_centers.center_id JOIN vaccines ON immunization_schedule.vaccine_id = vaccines.vaccine_id WHERE immunization_schedule.schedule_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-12-31';
SELECT AVG(dose_required) AS avg_doses_required FROM vaccines;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_centers;
SELECT center_name, region_id FROM vaccination_centers WHERE region_id = 3;
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer FROM vaccines ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT schedule_id, center_id, schedule_date FROM immunization_schedule WHERE center_id = 2;
SELECT region_id, region_name, country_name FROM regions WHERE region_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM vaccination_centers;
SELECT center_id, center_name FROM vaccination_centers ORDER BY center_id DESC;
SELECT region_name, country_name FROM regions WHERE country_name = 'USA';
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer FROM vaccines WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer' OR manufacturer = 'Moderna';
SELECT center_name, region_name, vaccine_name, schedule_date FROM immunization_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_centers;
SELECT center_name, region, country FROM vaccination_centers WHERE region='Asia';
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer, recommended_age FROM vaccines ORDER BY recommended_age DESC;
SELECT center_name, region, country FROM vaccination_centers WHERE country='USA';
SELECT patient_id, dosage, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records ORDER BY vaccination_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vaccination_centers WHERE region = 'Asia';
SELECT center_name, country FROM vaccination_centers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT vaccine_name, manufacturer, recommended_age FROM vaccines ORDER BY recommended_age DESC;
SELECT center_name, region, country FROM vaccination_centers WHERE region = 'Europe' AND country = 'Germany';
SELECT patient_id, vaccination_date FROM vaccination_records WHERE dosage = 2 ORDER BY vaccination_date ASC;
